description: Amendments to planning permission dated 17 December 2019 (RN: 19/02449/FULL) for Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 19 November 2018 (RN: 18/04595/FULL), which itself varied Conditions 1, 15 and 16 and removal of Condition 49 of planning permission dated 1 November 2017 (RN: 16/12203/FULL), which varied Condition 1 and removed Condition 10 of planning permission dated 27 April 2016 (RN: 15/10072/FULL) for: Demolition of and redevelopment of building behind retained and refurbished facades to Queensway and Porchester Gardens facades to provide a mixed use development comprising three basement levels, ground floor and up to 10 upper floor levels, containing residential units (Class C3), retail floorspace (Class A1 and A3) facing Queensway and arranged around a new retail arcade below re-provided central atrium and central retail courtyard, public car park, hotel (Class C1), cinema (Class D2) gym (Class D2), cr√®che (Class D1), with associated landscaping and public realm improvements, provision of basement residential parking spaces, cycle parking and associated basement level plant and servicing provision.  (Linked to 19/02374/LBC); NAMELY, to split the double height cinema screen (screen 1) into a single storey by inserting a slab between basement level 1 and basement level 2 and creating a multipurpose sports room to be used by the future residents of the site at Basement Level 2.
